title: New: sales – toto / renee
content:
Having impressed with their playful debut track renee, Orlando duo sales have released a follow up track, in the form of the adorably dreamy toto.

As with their first outing, toto relies on the simplistic instrumentation and stunning vocals provided by Lauren Morgan. There’s touches of Beach House and Fiest, yet all tied up with their own unique brand of twee lo-fi. Check out toto and renee below, and keep up with the duo via Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
